participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ethan is upbeat and expressive, always eager to share his passions and connect with others.
participant_1.background: I'm excited to see my girlfriend after my long run. I listen to folk music. I enjoy performing on stage, because it gives me a chance to express myself and connect with others. I'm allergic to bees. My children are a disappointment.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is adventurous and creative, always looking for new experiences and ways to express herself through writing.
participant_2.background: I would brag about my climbing skills and all the amazing places I've been able to go because of them. I write fiction for fun. I'm still getting to know my boss. I love to watch movies, even though it's not the most productive use of my time. My dolls help me cope with the stress of my job.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
Great! Just got back from a climbing trip, I'm pretty sore but it was a lot of fun.
Climbing sounds really fun, I've never tried it before.
You should! It's a great way to get in shape and see some amazing places.
I might have to check it out. What's your favorite climbing spot?
I really love climbing in Yosemite. The views are amazing and there are so many different routes to choose from.
Yosemite looks beautiful, I've seen pictures of it before.
It's even better in person. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go running, listen to music, and perform on stage.
Running sounds like a great way to stay in shape. I love listening to music too. What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is folk music.
Folk music is really nice. I like to write fiction for fun.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to try writing, but I'm not very good at it.
It's not that hard, you just have to practice.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
